description:
Show Linux Process information as captured by 
 https://github.com/ncabatoff/process-exporter  designed for PMM

options.content: Data for $host with $interval resolution

panels.title: $host: 进程用户态+内核态CPU占用总和(System+User)
$host:进程驻留内存+交换空间占用(RES+SWAP)
$host:进程打开文件描述符数量(open files)
Top processes by number of  processes instances
Top processes by number of threads
Top Processes by Voluntary Context Switches
Top Processes by  Non-Voluntary Context Switches
Top processes by File Descriptor Usage Percent
Top processes by Major Page Faults
Top processes by Minor Page Faults

targets.expr:
topk(1000,(
max_over_time(namedprocess_namegroup_states{instance=~"$host", groupname=~"$processes", state="Running"}[$interval]) or
max_over_time(namedprocess_namegroup_states{instance=~"$host", groupname=~"$processes", state="Running"}[5m])))

topk(1000,(
max_over_time(namedprocess_namegroup_states{instance=~"$host", groupname=~"$processes", state="Waiting"}[$interval]) or
max_over_time(namedprocess_namegroup_states{instance=~"$host", groupname=~"$processes", state="Waiting"}[5m])))

panels.title: Top of processes waiting on IO

title: 进程详细数据
